verses.verse: I wish <S%G3785><s%> that you would bear <S%G430><s%> with me in a little <S%G3398><s%> foolishness; <S%G877><s%> but indeed <S%G2532><s%> you are bearing <S%G430><s%> with me.

For I am <S%G2206><s%> jealous <S%G2206><s%> for you with a godly <S%G2316><s%> jealousy; <S%G2205><s%> for I betrothed <S%G718><s%> you to one <S%G1520><s%> husband, <S%G435><s%> that to Christ <S%G5547><s%> I might present <S%G3936><s%> you [as] a pure <S%G53><s%> virgin. <S%G3933><s%>

But I am <S%G5399><s%> afraid, <S%G5399><s%> lest <S%G3381><s%> as the serpent <S%G3789><s%> deceived <S%G1818><s%> Eve <S%G2096><s%> by his craftiness, <S%G3834><s%> your minds <S%G3540><s%> should be led <S%G5351><s%> astray <S%G5351><s%> from the simplicity <S%G572><s%> and purity <S%G54><s%> [of devotion] to Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> one comes <S%G2064><s%> and preaches <S%G2784><s%> another <S%G243><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have not preached, <S%G2784><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> you receive <S%G2983><s%> a different <S%G2087><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have not received, <S%G2983><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a different <S%G2087><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have not accepted, <S%G1209><s%> you bear <S%G430><s%> [this] beautifully. <S%G2573><s%>
For I consider <S%G3049><s%> myself not in the least <S%G3367><s%> inferior <S%G5302><s%> to the most <S%G5244><s%> eminent <S%G5244><s%> apostles. <S%G652><s%>

But even <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I am unskilled <S%G2399><s%> in speech, <S%G3056><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> I am not [so] in knowledge; <S%G1108><s%> in fact, <S%G235><s%> in every <S%G3956><s%> way <S%G3956><s%> we have made <S%G5319><s%> [this] evident <S%G5319><s%> to you in all <S%G3956><s%> things. <S%G3956><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> did I commit <S%G4160><s%> a sin <S%G266><s%> in humbling <S%G5013><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> that you might be exalted, <S%G5312><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I preached <S%G2097><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to you without <S%G1431><s%> charge <S%G1431><s%>?
I robbed <S%G4813><s%> other <S%G243><s%> churches, <S%G1577><s%> taking <S%G2983><s%> wages <S%G3800><s%> [from them] to serve <S%G1248><s%> you;

and when I was present <S%G3918><s%> with you and was in need, <S%G5302><s%> I was not a burden <S%G2655><s%> to anyone; <S%G3762><s%> for when the brethren <S%G80><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> from Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> they fully <S%G4322><s%> supplied <S%G4322><s%> my need, <S%G5303><s%> and in everything <S%G3956><s%> I kept <S%G5083><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> from being a burden to you, and will continue <S%G4><s%> to do so.

As the truth <S%G225><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> is in me, this <S%G3778><s%> boasting <S%G2746><s%> of mine <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1473><s%> will not be stopped <S%G5420><s%> in the regions <S%G2824><s%> of Achaia. <S%G882><s%>
Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%>? Because <S%G3754><s%> I do not love <S%G25><s%> you? God <S%G2316><s%> knows <S%G3609><s%> [I do!]

But what <S%G3739><s%> I am doing, <S%G4160><s%> I will continue <S%G2532><s%> to do, <S%G4160><s%> that I may cut <S%G1581><s%> off <S%G1581><s%> opportunity <S%G874><s%> from those <S%G3588><s%> who desire <S%G2309><s%> an opportunity <S%G874><s%> to be regarded <S%G2147><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as we are in the matter about which <S%G3739><s%> they are boasting. <S%G2744><s%>

For such <S%G5108><s%> men <S%G5108><s%> are false <S%G5570><s%> apostles, <S%G5570><s%> deceitful <S%G1386><s%> workers, <S%G2040><s%> disguising <S%G3345><s%> themselves as apostles <S%G652><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
And no <S%G3756><s%> wonder, <S%G2295><s%> for even <S%G846><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> disguises <S%G3345><s%> himself as an angel <S%G32><s%> of light. <S%G5457><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> it is not surprising <S%G3173><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> his servants <S%G1249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> disguise <S%G3345><s%> themselves as servants <S%G1249><s%> of righteousness; <S%G1343><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> shall be according <S%G2596><s%> to their deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> let no <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> me foolish; <S%G878><s%> but if <S%G1487><s%> [you do,] receive <S%G1209><s%> me even <S%G2579><s%> as foolish, <S%G878><s%> that I also <S%G2532><s%> may boast <S%G2744><s%> a little. <S%G3398><s%>

That which <S%G3739><s%> I am speaking, <S%G2980><s%> I am not speaking <S%G2980><s%> as the Lord <S%G2962><s%> would, but as in foolishness, <S%G877><s%> in this <S%G3778><s%> confidence <S%G5287><s%> of boasting. <S%G2746><s%>
Since <S%G1893><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> boast <S%G2744><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> I will boast <S%G2744><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
For you, being <S%G1510><s%> [so] wise, <S%G5429><s%> bear <S%G430><s%> with the foolish <S%G878><s%> gladly. <S%G2234><s%>

For you bear <S%G430><s%> with anyone <S%G5100><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he enslaves <S%G2615><s%> you, if <S%G1487><s%> he devours <S%G2719><s%> you, if <S%G1487><s%> he takes <S%G2983><s%> advantage of you, if <S%G1487><s%> he exalts <S%G1869><s%> himself, if <S%G1487><s%> he hits <S%G1194><s%> you in the face. <S%G4383><s%>

To [my] shame <S%G819><s%> I [must] say <S%G3004><s%> that we have been weak <S%G770><s%> [by comparison.] But in whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> respect anyone <S%G5100><s%> [else] is bold <S%G5111><s%> (I speak <S%G3004><s%> in foolishness <S%G877><s%>), I am <S%G5111><s%> just <S%G2532><s%> as bold <S%G5111><s%> myself. <S%G1473><s%>
Are they Hebrews <S%G1445><s%>? So <S%G2532><s%> am I. Are they Israelites <S%G2475><s%>? So <S%G2532><s%> am I. Are they descendants <S%G4690><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%>? So <S%G2532><s%> am I.

Are they servants <S%G1249><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>? (I speak <S%G2980><s%> as if insane <S%G3912><s%>) I more <S%G5228><s%> so; <S%G5228><s%> in far <S%G4057><s%> more <S%G4057><s%> labors, <S%G2873><s%> in far <S%G4057><s%> more <S%G4057><s%> imprisonments, <S%G5438><s%> beaten <S%G4127><s%> times <S%G5234><s%> without <S%G5234><s%> number, <S%G5234><s%> often <S%G4178><s%> in danger <S%G2288><s%> of death. <S%G2288><s%>
Five <S%G3999><s%> times <S%G3999><s%> I received <S%G2983><s%> from the Jews <S%G2453><s%> thirty-nine [lashes.]

Three <S%G5151><s%> times <S%G5151><s%> I was beaten <S%G4463><s%> with rods, <S%G4463><s%> once <S%G530><s%> I was stoned, <S%G3034><s%> three <S%G5151><s%> times <S%G5151><s%> I was shipwrecked, <S%G3489><s%> a night <S%G3574><s%> and a day <S%G3574><s%> I have spent <S%G4160><s%> in the deep. <S%G1037><s%>

[I have been] on frequent <S%G4178><s%> journeys, <S%G3597><s%> in dangers <S%G2794><s%> from rivers, <S%G4215><s%> dangers <S%G2794><s%> from robbers, <S%G3027><s%> dangers <S%G2794><s%> from [my] countrymen, <S%G1085><s%> dangers <S%G2794><s%> from the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> dangers <S%G2794><s%> in the city, <S%G4172><s%> dangers <S%G2794><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2047><s%> dangers <S%G2794><s%> on the sea, <S%G2281><s%> dangers <S%G2794><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> false <S%G5569><s%> brethren; <S%G5569><s%>

[I have been] in labor <S%G2873><s%> and hardship, <S%G3449><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> many <S%G4178><s%> sleepless <S%G70><s%> nights, <S%G70><s%> in hunger <S%G3042><s%> and thirst, <S%G1373><s%> often <S%G4178><s%> without <S%G3521><s%> food, <S%G3521><s%> in cold <S%G5592><s%> and exposure. <S%G1132><s%>

Apart <S%G5565><s%> from [such] external <S%G3924><s%> things, there is the daily <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> pressure <S%G7081><s%> upon me [of] concern <S%G3308><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> the churches. <S%G1577><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> is weak <S%G770><s%> without <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> my being weak <S%G770><s%>? Who <S%G5101><s%> is led <S%G4624><s%> into sin <S%G4624><s%> without <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> my intense <S%G4448><s%> concern <S%G4448><s%>?
If <S%G1487><s%> I have <S%G1163><s%> to boast, <S%G2744><s%> I will boast <S%G2744><s%> of what <S%G769><s%> pertains to my weakness. <S%G769><s%>

The God <S%G2316><s%> and Father <S%G3962><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> He who is blessed <S%G2128><s%> forever, <S%G165><s%> knows <S%G3609><s%> that I am not lying. <S%G5574><s%>

In Damascus <S%G1154><s%> the ethnarch <S%G1481><s%> under Aretas <S%G702><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> was guarding <S%G5432><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> of the Damascenes <S%G1153><s%> in order to seize <S%G4084><s%> me,

and I was let <S%G5465><s%> down <S%G5465><s%> in a basket <S%G4553><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> a window <S%G2376><s%> in the wall, <S%G5038><s%> and [so] escaped <S%G1628><s%> his hands. <S%G5495><s%>
